meanings.definition: relating to or resembling a horse or other member of the horse family
meanings.sent1: The farm had a beautiful field where equines grazed peacefully.
meanings.sent2: She admired the equines for their graceful movements.
meanings.sent3: The equines in the race wore colorful hats, making them look quite stylish.
meanings.sent4: The artist painted a stunning portrait of equines running freely in the meadow.
meanings.sent5: Children giggled with delight as they rode the equines at the petting zoo.

meanings.definition: a horse or other member of the horse family
meanings.sent1: The equines in the pasture neighed softly in the evening.
meanings.sent2: Farmers relied on equines for plowing the fields.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous equines played a game of tag in the meadow.
meanings.sent4: The majestic equines galloped across the open plains, a sight to behold.
meanings.sent5: Visitors to the ranch were greeted by friendly equines eager for a treat.
